Articles.Content:
Second patch and still no fix. This makes the game unplayable.

I have a pretty simple rocket that has a remote guidance unit on it. Inside the fairing is a small probe core for the detachable lander but that starts as OFF and isn't for control during launch.

Upon separation of the first stage (outer boosters off the main stack), I lose control. Even the quicksave and reload does not fix this. I never regain control. I get the commnet lost messaging upon reload of the save.
